sentences.sentence: A 6-wheel model of towed howitzer train is made.
sentences.translation: 建立了牵引火炮列车6轮输入模型；

sentences.sentence: System optimal design of howitzer is an important tool of system design.
sentences.translation: 火炮总体优化设计是总体设计的重要工具。

sentences.sentence: This is the heavy fire-power of the Libyan Army - a 155mm Palmaria self-propelled howitzer.
sentences.translation: 上图代表了利比亚陆军的强大火力，155毫米Palmaria型自行火炮。
